data.message: How do you change your name on fb? My boss is divorced and wants to Change her name but we can't see how

replies.message: Hi Jacqueline. You can change your name or add an alternate name (ex: nickname or maiden name) to your account by following these instructions in our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/XMpSmg. -Chantal
I don't know. But if you find out let me know. I want to add my maiden name. Was good to see you two at reunion. Don't be a stranger. Please.

You'll want to do more than change your name if you install the messaging app! You'll have to delete your whole account! Because when you install it your basically giving them permission to hack into your WHOLE entire personal life!!! Do we want that!? NO.  And the app can do everything you do on a regular basis without you even knowing they're getting your identity!
I have that app and no problem here maybe it's just yours

Jacqueline, don't be fooled. Have you read the "fine print" to downloading this new messenger?? They can access your camera, pics, microphone, ETC!! And they don't need your permission. Read it girl!! Then delete it.
go to your settings, I was told I can't change my name since I have changed it 3 times WTF????????????
I am so sick of facebook changes apparently COO who wrote the book "Lean in" I want you to Lean out of my personal space.
